name: VA Blue Button Data File
summary: Learn about .BLUEBUTTON files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The BLUEBUTTON file is created by VA Blue Button when a patient downloads his medical information from the VA Blue Button website. The file can be shared with others caring for the patient, such as a family member, doctor, or other caregiver.
NOTE: In 2015, the BLUEBUTTON format was discontinued. VA Blue Button replaced the BLUEBUTTON file with .TXT and .PDF files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
